title: Factory method to create Bbox from bounds object
description:
Hi Karl Wright,

I propose a new factory method in the bounding box factory from a LatLonBounds object. It is an utility method but I have the feeling to have to always write it when trying to build a bounding box so it may be worthy to add it. I will attach a patch.

comments.content: Ignacio Vera, this looks fine but I'd like a corresponding one for the xyz solid factory as well.  So I'll add that to the commit.
